issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Simplify code to test cast
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9886](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9886). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We have 3 tests with similar functionality, but that only vary on the types they test. Let's create a macro to apply to all of them, so that the tests are equivalent and DRY.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9886?focusedCommentId=17188098) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8077
